content: lotus mittens thro every hollow cave and alley lone round and round the spicy downs the yellow lotos-dust is blown -- tennyson the lotos-eaters this mitten is a modern twist on the traditional norwegian stranded mittens the centre flowers are lotus blossoms instead of selbu roses and the geometric cuff adds to the modern look knit in traditional black and white for a subtle difference or in bright colours for a trendy look materials set of 5 dpns size 2 25 mm these are knit at a fairly tight gauge for warmth and wind protection ~ 120 yds of main colour fingering weight check gauge throughout project to ~ 120 yds of contrast colour fingering weight avoid mismatched mittens to tapestry needle increase size simply adjust needles 2 scrap pieces of yarn and/or yarn to adjust gauge gauge 10 sts and 10 row = 1 across palm final measurements 8 circumference 4 across palm charts legend thumb chart ©hedda knits august 2010 pattern make one lh and one rh cast on 72 stitches in main colour and divide evenly among needles join in round being careful not to twist the stitches and knit four row in k2 p2 ribbing knit cuff chart using main colour and contrast colour be careful not to pull the yarn floats too tightly begin main chart don t forget the increases the thumb gusset will take shape as you proceed when you reach the thumb line set aside the 16 sts as indicated by the chart onto a scrap piece of yarn and cast on 9 sts using reverse cast-on method if you would like a basic thumb gusset tutorial please contact the designer continue working main chart to final row don t forget the decreases break off yarn and using tapestry needle thread through the remaining 8 sts and pull tight then pull through top of mitten to the inside weave in ends thumb place the 16 sts from scrap yarn onto one needle pick up 12 sts from earlier reverse cast-on then 2 sts on either side of thumb hole divide on dpns and knit chart starting with palm facing up front side of thumb 32 sts knit thumb chart finish thumb in same manner as mitten tip by pulling yarn through the remaining sts and weaving ends inside repeat for second mitten weave in ends and block lightly cuff chart ©hedda knits august 2010 left hand ©hedda knits august 2010 right hand ©hedda knits august 2010
